Access Port and carbon fibre shift knob

"

  • back
    to archive

Homeâ€º f1vlad's blog archive

It has been a long time that my Access Port and carbon fibre shift knob have been sitting in a box awaiting installation. I received them some time after Black Friday.

Today, a nice warm day, I decided to finally get these things installed. Everything went smooth, shift knob is great and more torque is already there with Access Port. Now it's just a matter of some time before car ECU re-learns.

One observation to note from this Access Port version 2 is that it's much easier and quicker to install new map then Access Port version 1. I've reflashed Stage 1 93, but also want to try Stage 1 91 when I hit the road heading south later this month.

Sun, February 15 2009
